app.name: GC Backup Launcher
app.short_description: Play GC Backups without Modchip on Wii
app.long_description: Play your GC games with the GC Backup Launcher. The MIOS need to be patched and a cIOS/IOS249 with backup support is required! USE AT YOUR OWN RISK! The software is free of charge and the source code is included in the package.
